Title: The Supply of Fasteners
Description: The requirement covers a variety of Fasteners, including, but not limited to, items such as screws, nails, rivets, washers and bolts. It will be tendered as one lot, for a duration of up to 4 years (configured as an initial 2 year period plus 1 x 2 year option period).
Additional Text: The award value of Â£10.4m shown is based on the maximum estimated demand over the 4 year period.  This value includes provision for options made in the original Logistics Commodities and Services Transformation (" LCST") contract which, it is anticipated, the Customer will take up during the lifetime of the awarded framework.  Any items included in these options will be within the scope of the Common Procurement Vocabulary (CPV) codes.  Further Leidos may be required to: (i) add additional in scope items to the Schedule of Requirement (SoR) during the life of the contract (and/or (ii) to manage the range of items supplied under the Agreement (for instance, by de-listing slow moving or obsolescent items and/or adding new/replacement in-scope items).
